page.title: 20Springfield Place
page.content: Springfield Place dates back to about 1573. It was an Elizabethen house and is now Georgian style.There's supposed to be a ghost haunting the house.The story is told that the owners wife had a child who was ill,so her mother took her into the blue room so as not to disturb her father.She put the baby to bed and went to bed herself.She woke up later to hear her daughter saying, 'Funny man,funny man'.She looked up and saw a dwarf standing with his back to the fire.She was so frightened she shot under the bed covers.She looked up again and the man was gone.Her daughter was still saying, 'Funny man,funny man'.There's been recent reports of the ghost.A workman left his tools in the blue room.When he returned his tools were gone and were later found in another room.
